Hero.title: About Us
Hero.heading: Alsha - Artificial Intelligence that Communicates in Pure Uzbek Language
Hero.subheading: Boost your business efficiency with the latest technologies.

Products.AI_FEATURES: AI has the following broad capabilities
Products.STT_DESC: Converts Uzbek language audio materials into text with high accuracy
Products.TTS_DESC: Creates natural-sounding speech from Uzbek language text
Products.CHATBOT_DESC: Engages in intelligent and contextually appropriate conversations with users and provides quick responses
Products.SPEECH_RECOGNITION_DESC: Detects and understands human speech. This technology helps devices execute voice commands.
Products.DIARIZATION_DESC: Identifies different speakers in a conversation and transcribes each voice separately.
Products.VOICE_CLONING_DESC: Feature for accurate and natural-sounding voice cloning.

VoiceSection.title: Speech to Text (STT)
VoiceSection.subtitle: Converts Uzbek audio materials into text with high accuracy
VoiceSection.supportedFormats: Supports OGG, MP3 formats. Audio duration limit is 10 minutes.
